attractions.name: Teatro Colón
attractions.description: World-renowned opera house and concert hall, considered one of the finest in the world for its exceptional acoustics and stunning architecture. A must-visit cultural landmark.

attractions.name: La Boca & Caminito
attractions.address: Caminito, La Boca, Buenos Aires, Argentina
attractions.description: Colorful neighborhood famous for its vibrant street art, tango performances, and the iconic Boca Juniors football stadium. A bohemian cultural hub.

attractions.name: Puerto Madero
attractions.description: Modern waterfront district featuring upscale restaurants, corporate offices, and luxury apartments. Perfect for business meetings and elegant dining.

attractions.name: Recoleta Cemetery
attractions.description: Historic cemetery where Eva Perón rests, featuring elaborate mausoleums and sculptures. A unique blend of history, art, and Argentine heritage.

attractions.name: San Telmo Market
attractions.description: Traditional Sunday market featuring antiques, local crafts, and street tango performances. Experience authentic Argentine culture and find unique treasures.

attractions.name: Palermo Parks
attractions.description: Vast green spaces including Rose Garden and Japanese Garden. Ideal for business retreats, outdoor meetings, and recreational activities.

attractions.name: Microcentro Financial District
attractions.description: Heart of Buenos Aires' financial sector, home to banks, government buildings, and corporate headquarters. The business pulse of Argentina.

attractions.name: Tigre Delta
attractions.description: Unique river delta system accessible by boat or train from Buenos Aires. Perfect for corporate retreats and exploring Argentina's natural waterways.
